{{Wireless embedded system |brand=WRTnode |model=2 |revision=Q (QCA9531) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price=15 |est_release_date=08/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=mini module, IoT board |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=Mini PCIe |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=NOR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=DDR2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, NGFF, USB 2.0 (pins) |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_module=WRTnode 2Q |wi1_module_if=NGFF |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9531;QCA9531-BL3A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.8.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|WRTnode 2Q IoT Board (QCA9531)}} :[http://wrtnode.cc/html/hardware_2.html Product page] {{•}} [https://github.com/WRTnode WRTnode GitHub] :[http://wiki.wrtnode.com/index.php?title=Main_Page WRTnode 1 Wiki] {{•}} [http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=首页/en WRTnode 2 Wiki]
====[[WRTnode 2Q]]==== *SoC: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @560MHz *Flash: 16MB (NOR), RAM: 128MB (DDR2) *WLAN: WiSoC 802.11bgn 2T2R (300Mbps) *I/O's via NGFF (M.2 2242 Key B) connector: :1x PCIe X1, USB 2.0 host, SD-XC (for microSD) :2x UART, SPI (master/slave), I2C, 20x GPIO :5x FE (100Mbps) Ethernet • [http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=WRTnode2Q详细参数 Spec.] *Dimensions: 42 x 22 mm
===Reviews=== *[http://onewrt.com/lede-project-wrtnode-2q/ ''WRTnode 2Q & LEDE'' on '''OneWrt'''] ([http://wiki.wrtnode.cc/index.php?title=WRTnode2Q开箱指南 OpenWrt]) *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/17/wrtnode2p-wrtnode2r-and-wrtnodehi-openwrt-boards-to-feature-m-2-mini-pcie-edge-connectors-h-265-camera-support-and-more/ ''WRTnode Boards'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ([http://wrtnode.cc/html/batch.html Models])
